briefTitle: Study of Azilect® (Rasagiline) in Levodopa-treated Parkinson's Disease Patients With Motor Fluctuations in Korea
officialTitle: Randomised, Double-blind, Parallel-group, Placebo-controlled, Fixed-dose Study of [Azilect®] Rasagiline in Levodopa-treated Parkinson's Patients With Motor Fluctuations in Korea
summary: To evaluate the efficacy of a fixed dose of Azilect® (1 mg/day) vs placebo as assessed by the change from baseline in mean total daily OFF time during 18 weeks of treatment in levodopa-treated Parkinson's Disease (PD) patients with motor fluctuations in Korea.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Mean Total Daily OFF Time Using Parkinson's Disease Patient Diary
